answers.answer: Hi...per ur other thread, I suggested u get another opinion...u have quite a bit going on....get testing to see what is behind it all.It is possible u have a thyroid issue with the hair loss....but there r sooooooo many conditions with the same symptoms...that is y testing is done....Have u been checked for other joint issues like Lymes, lupus, Ehlers-Danlos...to name a few???I have elbow pain too, and was told it may very well be tennis elbow (common name ) or epichondialitis....as u mentioned....I later found out it was Ehlers-Danlos after a dr did testing for lymes and lupus...even xrays to rule out a hair line fracture....U may also be dealing with IBS....or some imbalance in ur digestive tract...see a GI dr for that...the pressure from that may be affecting ur bladder as well.Good luck"selma"
